skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Even the mightiest of foes can be run over with the right application of strength and skill. Especially if they are nothing more than cowardly Bright Wizards from the Empire.

ui_effects.localised_text: Increases this unit's ability to knock enemies back while active

stat_effects.description: x0.025 Dealt Collision Knocked Back Threshold
x0.022 Dealt Collision Knocked Down Threshold
x0.02 Dealt Collision Knocked Flying Threshold

effects.description:
Ability: "Chaos Charge" for Rotblood Engorged and Rotblood Eternals
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: Any heroes foolish enough to challenge Naglfahr or attempt to destroy the Skittergate will meet their demise upon his impressive axe.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: The patron diety of the Rotblood tribe has many gifts for those who are most devoted. Unending life is simply one of them.
Naglfahr is the Gatekeeper, and all who wish to fight the Ribspreader must first best his champion. And that is no easy task indeed.

enabled_if: Friendly Lord or Hero presence in ability range.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: Countless times have heroes from the Empire and Karaz-a-Karak risen up against the Rotblood Tribe, and countless times has Naglfahr sent them screaming into the welcoming arms of Papa Nurgle

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: It is Naglfahr's duty to protect those of the Rotblood Tribe and guard against any incursions from those weak southerners, and it is a duty he takes very seriously indeed.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Naglfahr serves as the grim guardian of the Skittergate keystaff deep in the icy wastes of Norsca. Clad in elaborate Chaos Warrior armor, his bleak, bald visage is exposed - a haunting reminder of his decay. Entrusted by his dark patron with safeguarding the keystaff, Naglfahr views this role as both an honor and a testament to his divine favor. In battle, Nurgle's ultimate "blessing" manifests when he sheds his mortal form, becoming a grotesque Chaos Spawn, embodying his god’s eternal cycle of rot and rebirth.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit takes no penalties when flanked.
Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison

effects.description:
Increased experience gain: +100% for units when fighting against the Forces of Order
	(all units in army)
